sentence: A subsequent surgical debridement was performed (Fig 1) during which sampled tissue was subjected to further microbiological testing, including being sent for acid-fast bacilli (AFB) stain and mycobacterial culture.
An X-ray of the affected finger confirmed changes consistent with osteomyelitis of the middle and proximal phalanges (Fig 2).
A red mark on the inner side of his right upper arm evolved into a small ulcer by late June, suggesting an incubation period of four to five weeks (Fig 3).
The core genome tree distinctly delineated the Batemans Bay isolates, setting them apart from the clinical isolates in Victoria in their own clade (Fig 6).

Notably, the isolates from Batemans Bay and Far East Gippsland are situated on a distinct branch of the phylogenetic tree, which merges at the most recent common ancestor of M. ulcerans in south-eastern Australia (Fig 6).

The relatively long branch length of the Batemans Bay M. ulcerans genomes, revealed by the phylogenomic analysis, is consistent with—as yet—unsampled genetically diverse M. ulcerans present on other areas of Australia (Fig 6).

A subsequent surgical debridement was performed (Fig 1) during which sampled tissue was subjected to further microbiological testing, including being sent for acid-fast bacilli (AFB) stain and mycobacterial culture.
